titles.title: Providing for the use of the catafalque situated in the crypt beneath the rotunda of the Capitol in connection with memorial services to be conducted in the Supreme Court Building for the late honorable William J. Brennan, former Associate Justice of the Supreme Court of the United States.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on House Oversight.
Mr. Thomas asked unanimous consent to discharge from committee and consider.
On agreeing to the resolution Agreed to without objection.
Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.
Resolution agreed to in Senate without amendment by Unanimous Consent. (CR S8170-8171)
Message on Senate action sent to the House.

bill.summary: 07/25/1997--Introduced. Directs the Architect of the Capitol to transfer the catafalque in the crypt beneath the rotunda of the Capitol to the Chief Justice of the United States to be used in the Supreme Court Building for funeral services for the late Honorable William J. Brennan, former Associate Justice of the U.S. Supreme Court.
